channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Harris floods the zone with Howard Stern, Stephen Colbert, podcast interviews in final sprint
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump are battling for the airwaves in the final sprint to the Nov. 5 election.

item.title: Berkshire now owns 100% of BHE, but the utility giant has been a weak spot for the conglomerate
item.description: The Omaha-based conglomerate entered a deal to acquire the 8% remaining stake in Berkshire Hathaway Energy from the heirs of the late Walter Scott.

item.title: Caffeine may be just the exercise booster you need—as long as you don’t over do it, say experts
item.description: “It’s a great performance enhancer,” one expert says. Here’s why it’s important to use the stimulant responsibly.

item.title: Wall Street resets rate-cut views with 'soft landing' in sight after jobs report
There's a 'hidden truth about American-style capitalism' investors need to know, Josh Brown says
item.description: CNBC spoke with Josh Brown in early October about his new book, "You Weren’t Supposed To See That: Secrets Every Investor Should Know." Here's more.

item.title: Why Cisco is looking at investing in hot AI startup CoreWeave
Goldman loves these stocks but the rest of Wall Street does not
item.description: The firm listed several buy-rated names, ranging from Shake Shack to TripAdvisor, that appear underappreciated by the market.

item.title: If you’re under 50 today, could you really live to 150? Geneticists and aging researchers weigh in
item.description: In the craze to live longer and healthier, how long can we expect to live?

item.title: U.S. stocks end higher after strong jobs report as S&P 500 ekes out weekly gain
Kamala Harris buoyed by jobs report, inflation numbers as Election Day nears
Affordable housing units across the U.S. are about to hit their expiration date
item.description: The buildings typically only need to be kept affordable for a minimum of 30 years.

item.title: Elon Musk says he is ‘Dark MAGA’ at Trump campaign rally
item.description: Billionaire tech executive Elon Musk cast the upcoming presidential election in dire terms during an appearance with Donald Trump.

item.title: How to watch Week Five of the 2024-2025 NFL season live online for free—and without cable
Hollywood's franchise frenzy: More than half of top studios' 2025 movies are existing IP
item.description: The 2024 box office has been inundated with sequels, prequels and remakes. That trend will continue, and expand, in 2025.

item.title: Bets that oil will hit $100 a barrel surge on fears of wider Middle Eastern war
